author: leandrolerena
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

The CSOM library is available on .NET core, can we have support for powershell core, cross-os? Would like to use it on linux containers :-) 

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what the problem is that the new feature would solve.
Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want X so that Y.' with X being the being the action and Y being the value of the action.
-->

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Base on the .NET core CSOM package on nuget

https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/blogs/net-standard-version-of-sharepoint-online-csom-apis/

Consider providing an example PowerShell experience with expected result.
-->

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: This request would probably be best asked of the Sharepoint team themselves. The PowerShell team don't own or manage the Sharepoint modules. 🙂

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Feature Request: Support PowerShell Core
